events.event: Pfizer founded in Brooklyn, New York
Scott Gottlieb (former FDA Commissioner) joins Pfizer board of directors
COVID-19 pandemic declared, vaccine development race begins
Pfizer partners with BioNTech for mRNA COVID vaccine development
Operation Warp Speed announced - government vaccine development funding
Pfizer receives $1.95 billion contract for 100 million vaccine doses
Pfizer announces 95% vaccine efficacy in clinical trials
FDA grants Emergency Use Authorization for Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine
FDA grants full approval to Pfizer COVID vaccine (Comirnaty)
Biden administration announces federal employee vaccine mandates
Pfizer COVID vaccine revenue reaches $37 billion (record pharmaceutical sales)
Pfizer seeks 75-year delay on FOIA release of clinical trial documents (court rejects)
Booster campaigns continue, Pfizer COVID revenue continues at $32+ billion
Vaccine uptake declines as mandates end, adverse event debates continue
